ygData.subject: Re: A Fallen Legend/Deja vu (Repost)/Council of evil (Cyclonus, Titobeau, Robo)
ygData.msgSnippet: There came a lound snarling voice over the radio with a lot of background noise. Trelos here!  I m ready to kill again! said the voice.  Where are you O
